adjectives.description: reboant (comparative more reboant, superlative most reboant)

entries.meaning: (chiefly poetic) That reverberates or resounds loudly.
examples: What if / Thou pleadest still, and seest me drive / Through utter dark a full-sail'd skiff, / Unpiloted i' the echoing dance / Of reboant whirlwinds, stooping low / Unto the death, not sunk!
